sentences.en: Advancing technology and affluence make it easier to modify living conditions and the management of resource.
sentences.cn: 由于科学技术不断发展,人们日益富裕,使得生活条件和资源的管理更加容易调节.

sentences.en: Adverbs are used to modify verbs, such as " quickly " in'she ran quickly ".
sentences.cn: 副词用来修饰动词, 例如: " 她快快地跑"中的 " 快快地".

sentences.en: Commonly, these keys are used to modify the functions of selection and drag - and - drop interactions .
sentences.cn: 一般来说, 这些键被用来改变选择和拖 放操作 的功能.

sentences.en: Established practices are difficult to modify.
sentences.cn: 既定的惯例是很难更改的.

sentences.en: Fertilizers modify the composition of herbage.
sentences.cn: 肥料可改变牧草的组成.

sentences.en: It is a rule of English that adjectives generally precede the noun they modify: we say "a good cry", not "a cry good".
sentences.cn: 英语规定形容词通常放在其修饰的名词前：我们说agoodcry，不说acrygood。

sentences.en: It is a rule of English that adjectives generally precede the noun they modify.
sentences.cn: 形容词一般放在所修饰名词的前面是英语中的一条规律。

sentences.en: It is possible to modify and combine existing laser, holographic and computer technology for intraoral use.
sentences.cn: 改进和综合现有的激光 、 全息和计算机技术,以便用于口腔内是完全有可能的.

sentences.en: The extent to which the Court will modify these doctrines is, as yet, unclear.
sentences.cn: 法院对这些原则修正的范围现在尚不清楚.

sentences.en: The feedback will be used to modify the course for next year.
sentences.cn: 这些反馈意见将用于修改明年的课程。

sentences.en: The grower can modify his cultural program.
sentences.cn: 生产者可以修改栽培措施.

sentences.en: The regulations can only be modified by a special committee.
sentences.cn: 这些法规只能由特别委员会来修改。

sentences.en: The structure of the iris will also modify the shade.
sentences.cn: 虹膜的结构也能影响眼睛的深浅.

sentences.en: The tribe has been forced to modify its chauvinistic attitudes.
sentences.cn: 部族不得不改变它的沙文主义姿态。

sentences.en: There have been attempts to modify the fiber chemically to resist abrasion enhancement.
sentences.cn: 过去曾设法用化学变性方法,提高纤维的抗磨损性能.

sentences.en: We may infer that this process, continued during centuries, would improve and modify any breed.
sentences.cn: 我们可以推想,这个方法, 如果继续到数百年之久, 必定会使任何品种得到改良.

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 改性剂；[语] 修饰语；修正的人

trans.tran_en: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective

trans.tran_cn: 改变，减轻，减缓，[语]修饰，（用变音符号）改变
trans.tran_en: to make small changes to something in order to improve it and make it more suitable or effective
